page.title: 18STAMBOURNE NEWSLETTER
page.content: The parish newsletter is published by the Parish Council. It is a 4-page duplicated leaflet, prepared and distributed by volunteers. It appears bi-monthly. It contains reports and notices of Parish Council meetings, and reports and announcements from all the other village organisations including the church and chapel. It does not carry commercial advertising although it supports the 'Use it or Lose it' campaign for village shops and Post Offices. The newsletter provides a valuable channel of communication for village organisations.
